page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY, SEAFORD
page.content: THERE ARE MANY{SKIPPING}GAMES,PLAYED MAINLY BY GIRLS. THEY SING RHYMES AS THEY TURN THE ROPE.{HOPSCOTCH}IS ANOTHER POPULAR GAME AND IS PLAYED ON A GRID CHALKED WITH NUMBERS ONE TO TEN. A STONE IS ROLLED ONTO A SQUARE AND THEN YOU HOP OVER THE GRID TO PICK IT UP. {FOOTBALL}IS A GOOD GAME FOR BOYS BUT MANY GIRLS LIKE TO PLAY AS WELL NOWADAYS.{NETBALL}IS A WINTERTIME GAME FOR GIRLS, BUT{BASKETBALL}IS INCREASINGLY POPULAR WITH EVERYONE. WE ENJOY{ROUNDERS AND TENNIS}IN THE SUMMER AND SOME BOYS PLAY{CRICKET. {MARBLES}IS THE BEST SUMMER GAME IN OUR PLAYGROUND EVERY YEAR. MANY CHILDREN NOW HAVE LITTLE{ELECTRONIC {GAMES}WHICH ARE LIKE POCKET VERSIONS OF THE{COMPUTER GAMES. BOARD GAMES}ARE STILL PLAYED,PARTICULARLY INDOORS IN THE WINTERTIME.
